sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; const pageData = { "id": "Accessibility", "section": "utilities", "source": "html", "slug": "/utilities/accessibility/html", "sourceLink": "https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/blob/main/packages/docs/src/patternfly/utilities/Accessibility/examples/Accessibility.md", "examples": [ "Screen reader only", "Visible", "Hidden" ] }; pageData.examples = { 'Screen reader only': props => This content is intended to be announced by assistive technologies, but not visually presented.","title":"Screen reader only","lang":"html"}}> , 'Visible': props => This unsets .pf-u-screen-reader and .pf-screen-reader. It will be visible.","title":"Visible","lang":"html"}}> , 'Hidden': props => This text is hidden.","title":"Hidden","lang":"html"}}> }; const Component = () => ( {`Examples`} {React.createElement(pageData.examples["Screen reader only"])} {React.createElement(pageData.examples["Visible"])} {React.createElement(pageData.examples["Hidden"])} {`Documentation`} {`Overview`}

{`Breakpoint is optional. Breakpoints: base (no breakpoint value), -on-sm, -on-md, -on-lg, -on-xl. `} {`Example .pf-u-screen-reader-on-lg`}

{`Usage`}
{`Class`}
{`Applied to`}
{`Outcome`}
{`.pf-u-screen-reader{-on-[breakpoint]}`}
{`*`}
{`Visually hides element, but leaves accessible to assistive technologies`}
{`.pf-u-visible{-on-[breakpoint]}`}
{`*`}
{`Unsets `} {`.pf-u-screen-reader`} {` and `} {`.pf-screen-reader`}
); Component.displayName = 'UtilitiesAccessibilityHtmlDocs'; Component.pageData = pageData; export default Component;
